Text: Thank you do much for this. Linux Journal is no more available on torrents and I suppose this is the first time I've seen Linux Format in English here on Piratebay.

Thank you for sharing this!
This is the best Linux magazine in the world.
I've been buying it since issue #71.
And I will continue to buy it so that I can get the DVD that comes with it.
Sometimes it's a double-sided DVD!
But a PDF version of the magazine is very welcome!
